org.oucs.oxpoints.model
Class OxPointsFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.oucs.oxpoints.model.OxPointsFactory

public class OxPointsFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory class to create OxPoints objects.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Arno Mittelbach

static OxPoints getEmptyInMemoryOxPoints()
          Creates an empty in memory OxPoints model that is not linked to any persistent data store.

Constructor Detail

OxPointsFactory

public OxPointsFactory()
Method Detail

getEmptyInMemoryOxPoints

public static OxPoints getEmptyInMemoryOxPoints()
Creates an empty in memory OxPoints model that is not linked to any persistent data store.

A time dimension indexer is set.

Returns:
A new OxPoints object.

getInMemoryOxPoints

public static OxPoints getInMemoryOxPoints()
Creates a new in-memory OxPoints system that is kept in sync with the persistent OxPoints object.

A time dimension indexer is set.

In memory objects should only be used for querying data.

Returns:
An OxPoints object with an in-memory store.
Throws:
OxPointsException
See Also:
getPersistentOxPoints()

getPersistentOxPoints

public static OxPoints getPersistentOxPoints()
Creates a new OxPoints model with a persistent data store.

The connection to the database is configured in the OxPointsConfiguration.

A time dimension indexer is NOT set.

The Persistent OxPoints object should only be used to add and change data. For querying the data, an in-memory OxPoints should be used.

Returns:
A new persistent OxPoints
Throws:
OxPointsException
See Also:
getInMemoryOxPoints(), OxPointsConfiguration
